/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. Cars and taxis are scattered along the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.
